call_title: UX challenges in web3 | Big Pampa | ErgoHack 9

key_facts.fact: BigPampa is the founder's company offering design solutions ranging from branding, web design, animation, 3D, all the way to UX, UI design and prototyping, focusing only on Web3 and blockchain related projects
key_facts.speaker: Nico

key_facts.fact: BigPampa has worked on Ergo ecosystem projects including Paideia, Palmyra and Spreadly
key_facts.speaker: Nico

key_facts.fact: Five UX challenges in Web3 were identified for analysis
key_facts.speaker: Nico

key_facts.fact: Nico's Twitter handle is @NicoUXUI for questions or comments
key_facts.speaker: Nico
